Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of booster parts.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

modelId.Wiki: The model ID for this part. Also determines the menu preview icon.

sortId.Wiki: 7 digits is the limit for s32 as the reinforcement level is taken into account in the program

energyMax.Wiki: The energy capacity of this booster.

energyRecoveryPerSec.Wiki: The energy recovery rate. In points per second.

consumeEN.Wiki: The consumption rate of energy. In points per second.

energyRecoveryDelayTimeSec.Wiki: The delay before energy recovery starts. In seconds.

f00_dashBoostMaxSpeedKMPH.Wiki: Maximum speed for ground boost. In kilometres per hour.

f01_dashBoostStartAccelMPSS.Wiki: Starting acceleration for ground boost. In metres per second ^ 2.

f02_dashBoostMaxAccelMPSS.Wiki: Maximum acceleration for ground boost. In metres per second ^ 2.

f03_dashBoostBeginAccelTimeSec.Wiki: Start acceleration duration for ground boost. In seconds.

f04_dashBoostBeginToMaxAccelTimeSec.AltName: Ground Boost: Start to Maximum Acceleration Duration
f04_dashBoostBeginToMaxAccelTimeSec.Wiki: Time from acceleration at start of ground boost to maximum acceleration. In seconds.

f05_consumeEN_boostMove.Wiki: The energy consumption for ground boost. Point per second.

f06_flyBoostHorizontalMaxSpeedKMPH.Wiki: Maximum horizontal speed for aerial boost. In kilometres per hour.

f07_flyBoostHorizontalStartAccelMPSS.Wiki: Starting horizontal acceleration for aerial boost. In metres per second ^ 2.

f08_flyBoostHorizontalMaxAccelMPSS.Wiki: Maximum horizontal acceleration for aerial boost. In metres per second ^ 2.

f09_flyBoostHorizontalBeginAccelTimeSec.AltName: Aerial Boost: Start Horizontal Acceleration Duration
f09_flyBoostHorizontalBeginAccelTimeSec.Wiki: Start horizontal acceleration duration for aerial boost. In seconds.

f10_flyBoostHorizontalBeginToMaxAccelTim.AltName: Aerial Boost: Start to Maximum Acceleration Duration
f10_flyBoostHorizontalBeginToMaxAccelTim.Wiki: Time from acceleration at start of aerial boost to maximum acceleration. In seconds.

f11_consumeEN_boostMoveAir.Wiki: The energy consumption for aerial boost. Point per second.

consumeEN_BoostUp.Wiki: The energy consumption for vertical boost. Point per second.

consumeFixedEN_QB.Wiki: The energy consumption for quick boost.

QB_EndSpeedKMH.Wiki: Terminal speed during quick boost. In kilometres per hour.

QB_AccelTimeF30.Wiki: The duration for quick boost acceleration. 1 / 30 seconds.

dashBoost_EndSpeedKMH.Wiki: Terminal speed during ground boost. In kilometres per hour.

flyBoost_EndSpeedKMH.Wiki: Terminal speed during aerial boost. In kilometres per hour.

QB_StartAddSpeedKMH.Wiki: Additional initial velocity for quick boost. In kilometres per hour.

flyBoostUpperAccelMPSS.Wiki: Vertical aerial boost acceleration. In metres per second ^ 2.

flyBoostUpperMaxSpeedKMH.Wiki: Vertical aerial boost maximum speed. In kilometres per hour.

flyBoostUpperJumpAccelMPSS.AltName: Vertical Aerial Boost: Start Acceleration on Jump
flyBoostUpperJumpAccelMPSS.Wiki: Vertical aerial boost acceleration on jump. In metres per second ^ 2.

flyBoostUpperJumpEN.AltName: Vertical Aerial Boost: Energy Consumption on Jump
flyBoostUpperJumpEN.Wiki: Vertical aerial boost energy consumption on jump.

sellValue.Wiki: Price to sell the item for.

saleValue.Wiki: Price the item is on sale for.

QB_ReloadTimeSec.Wiki: Duration between quick boosts. In seconds.

flyBoostDownMaxSpeedKMH.Wiki: The maximum descent speed during an aerial boost. In kilometres per hour.

flyBoostUpperJumpDownMaxSpeedKMH.AltName: Aerial Boost: Maximum Descent Speed on Jump
flyBoostUpperJumpDownMaxSpeedKMH.Wiki: The maximum descent speed during an aerial boost after jump input. In kilometres per hour.

energyRecoveryDelayTimeForEmptySec.Wiki: The duration to wait for energy recovery (when energy is empty).

thrustersParamIDForPC.Wiki: For player, specify the ID of the thruster parameter (0 means no thruster).

upperBoostMaxSpeedKMPH.Wiki: The maximum ascent speed during a vertical boost. In kilometres per hour.

upperBoostStartAccelMPSS.Wiki: Vertical boost start acceleration. In metres per second ^ 2.

upperBoostMaxAccelMPSS.Wiki: Vertical boost max acceleration. In metres per second ^ 2.

upperBoostBeginAccelTimeSec.Wiki: Duration of vertical boost start acceleration. In seconds.

upperBoostBeginToMaxAccelTimeSec.AltName: Vertical Boost: Start to Maximum Acceleration Duration
upperBoostBeginToMaxAccelTimeSec.Wiki: Duration from start to maximum acceleration. In seconds.

upperBoostHorizontalMaxSpeedKMPH.Wiki: Maximum horizontal speed for the vertical boost. In kilometres per hour.

upperBoostHorizontalAccelMPSS.Wiki: Horizontal acceleration for the vertical boost. In metres per second ^ 2.

upperBoostDownMaxSpeedKMPH.Wiki: Maximum descent speed for the vertical boost. In kilometres per hour.

assaultBoost_InitSpeedKMH.Wiki: Initial speed of assault boost. In kilometres per hour.

assaultBoost_EndSpeedKMH.Wiki: Terminal speed of assault boost. In kilometres per hour.

assaultBoost_MinAccelTimeF30.Wiki: Minimum acceleration time for the assault boost. In seconds. 1 / 30 seconds

assaultBoost_DrainEnStartTimeF32.AltName: Assault Boost: Continuous Energy Consumption Start Time
assaultBoost_DrainEnStartTimeF32.Wiki: Time before continuous energy consumption starts. 1 / 30 seconds.

assaultBoost_ReloadTimeSec.Wiki: Duration between uses of assault boost. In seconds.

assaultBoost_OneShotDrainEnPoint.Wiki: Energy consumption for initial assault boost.

assaultBoost_DrainEnPointPerSec.Wiki: Energy consumption for assault boost per tick. In seconds.

Maker.Wiki: The maker icon to use for this booster.

bladeHoming_InitSpeedKMH.Wiki: Initial speed of blade attack homing. In kilometres per hour.

bladeHoming_EndSpeedKMH.Wiki: Terminal speed of blade attack homing. In kilometres per hour.

bladeHoming_MinAccelTimeF30.Wiki: Maximum acceleration time for blade attack homing. 1 / 30 seconds.

bladeHoming_DrainEnStartTimeF32.AltName: Blade Homing: Continuous Energy Consumption Start Time
bladeHoming_DrainEnStartTimeF32.Wiki: Time before continuous energy consumption starts. 1 / 30 seconds.

bladeHoming_OneShotDrainEnPoint.Wiki: Energy consumption for initial blade homing attack.

bladeHoming_DrainEnPointPerSec.Wiki: Energy consumption for blade homing attack per tick. In seconds.

flyBoostUpperJumpMaxAccelMPSS.AltName: Aerial Boost: Maximum Acceleration after Jump
flyBoostUpperJumpMaxAccelMPSS.Wiki: Maximum acceleration during aerial boost after jump. In metres per second ^ 2.

flyBoostUpperJumpBeginAccelTimeSec.AltName: Aerial Boost: Start Acceleration Duration after Jump
flyBoostUpperJumpBeginAccelTimeSec.Wiki: Start acceleration duration during aerial boost after jump. In seconds.

flyBoostUpperJumpBeginToMaxAccelTimeSec.AltName: Aerial Boost: Start to Maximum Acceleration Duration after Jump
flyBoostUpperJumpBeginToMaxAccelTimeSec.Wiki: Start acceleration to maximum acceleration duration during aerial boost after jump. In seconds.

refId.Wiki: Booster ID to inherit parameters from.

assaultBoostSideAvoid_InitSpeedKMH.Wiki: Initial speed of assault boost dodge. In kilometres per hour.

assaultBoostSideAvoid_EndSpeedKMH.Wiki: Terminal speed of assault boost dodge. In kilometres per hour.

assaultBoostSideAvoid_MinAccelTimeF30.AltName: Assault Boost Dodge: Minimum Acceleration Time
assaultBoostSideAvoid_MinAccelTimeF30.Wiki: Minimum acceleration time for the assault boost dodge. In seconds. 1 / 30 seconds

assaultBoostSideAvoid_DrainEnStartTimeF3.AltName: Assault Boost Dodge: Continuous Energy Consumption Start Time
assaultBoostSideAvoid_DrainEnStartTimeF3.Wiki: Time before continuous energy consumption starts. 1 / 30 seconds.

assaultBoostSideAvoid_OneShotDrainEnPoin.AltName: Assault Boost Dodge: Initial Energy Consumption
assaultBoostSideAvoid_OneShotDrainEnPoin.Wiki: Energy consumption for initial assault boost dodge.

assaultBoostSideAvoid_DrainEnPointPerSec.AltName: Assault Boost Dodge: Continuous Energy Consumpion
assaultBoostSideAvoid_DrainEnPointPerSec.Wiki: Energy consumption for assault boost dodge per tick. In seconds.
